qas.question: What is used to calculate cross section area in the volume of an object?

answers.text: pressure terms associated with forces that act normal to the cross-sectional area (the matrix diagonals of the tensor) as well as shear terms

qas.question: What are associated with normal forces?
What includes pressure terms when calculating area in volume?

answers.text: the relevant cross-sectional area for the volume for which the stress-tensor is being calculated

qas.question: What does not cause strain in structures?
What is associated with abnormal forces?
What is associated with horizontal forces?
Another term for on-diagonal elements is what?
